cofh.api.energy

Interface IEnergyHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEnergyConnection
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEnergyProvider, IEnergyReceiver, IEnergyTransport
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TileEnergyHandler

    public interface IEnergyHandler
extends IEnergyConnection
    Implement this interface on Tile Entities which should handle energy, generally storing it in one or more internal IEnergyStorage objects. A reference implementation is provided TileEnergyHandler. Note that IEnergyReceiver and IEnergyProvider are extensions of this.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getEnergyStored(net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing from)
      Returns the amount of energy currently stored.
      int getMaxEnergyStored(net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing from)
      Returns the maximum amount of energy that can be stored.
